recap_documents.description: PETITION for Writ of Habeas Corpus filed by Leqaa Kordia. In each Notice of Electronic Filing, the judge assignment is indicated, and a link to the Judges Copy Requirements is provided. The court reminds the filer that any required copy of this and future documents must be delivered to the judge, in the manner prescribed, within three business days of filing. (Filing fee $5; receipt number ATXNDC-15465631) Unless exempted, attorneys who are not admitted to practice in the Northern District of Texas must seek admission promptly. Forms, instructions, and exemption information may be found at www.txnd.uscourts.gov, or by clicking here: Attorney Information - Bar Membership. If admission requirements are not satisfied within 21 days, the clerk will notify the presiding judge. (Attachments: # 1 Cover Sheet) (Siegel, Charles) (Attachment 1 replaced on 5/1/2025) (knb). (Entered: 04/30/2025)

recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM OPINION & ORDER: 65 Mtn for Final Approval of Class Action Settlement and Plan of Allocation is granted, and 55 proposed settlement agreement is approved and binding on all class members. The Court certifies a class of persons or entities that acquired Intrusion, Inc. common stock from 10/14/20-8/26/21 and were damaged thereby, excluding Dfts; Intrusion Inc.'s officers, directors, affiliates, the employee retirement or benefit plan(s) and their participants or beneficiaries to the extent the stock was acquired through such plan; any entity in which Dfts have or had controlling interest; immediate family members, legal representatives, heirs, successors, or assigns of excluded persons/entities; and all who submit timely and valid requests for exclusion. The Court dismisses with prejudice all claims between the class and Dfts. The Court approves the ptys' allocation plan and directs the ptys to distribute the settlement fund through the claims administer in accordance with 55 the settlement agreement and stipulation. The Court grants 66 Motion for Attorneys Feesand Expenses: class counsel is awarded $1,083,332.00 in fees and $35,216.89 in expenses. Lead pla Bronstein is awarded $5,000 for expenses. Signed by District Judge Sean D. Jordan on 12/16/2022. (lrl, ) (Main Document 74 replaced on 12/16/2022) (lrl, ). Modified text of atty expense award on 12/20/2022 (lrl, ). (Entered: 12/16/2022)
